mapper.update: UPDATE F_MEMBER set memName = #{memName], memMail = ${memMail}, memAd1 = ${memAd1}, memAd2 = ${memAd2}, memAd3 = ${memAd3}, updatedate=SYSDATE WHERE memId = #{memId} and memPw = #{memPw}
mapper.select: SELECT level, fName, fCode, fCodeRef from goods_category start with fCodeRef is null connect by prior fCode = fCodeRef
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (fNum, fName, fCode, fPrice, fStock, fDes) values (goodsSeq.nextval, #{fName}, #{fCode}, #{fPrice}, #{fStock}, #{fDes})
mapper.select: SELECT fNum, fName, fcCode, fPrice, fStock, fDes, fImg, fDate from goods order by fNum desc
select g.fNum, g.fName, g.fCode, c.fcCodeRef, c.fcName, fPrice, fStock, fDes, fImg, fDate from goods g inner join goods_category c on g.fCode = c.fcCode where g.fNum = #{fNum}
